content: in this legal case the pärnu county court made a final decision after 10 months the details of the case are not mentioned but it involves mr np mr kp and mr sn the dispute is about the division of estate funeral expenses the court approved a compromise agreement where the estate will be distributed to mr bp the assets include a motor vehicle and funds in bank accounts mr np will keep the motor vehicle while mr kp and mr sn will transfer ownership to him they will also settle their financial claims with mr sn agreeing to pay mr np a certain amount within seven days the court order states that mr sn must pay interest at a rate of 025 per day until the full amount is paid both parties agree that the compromise settles all claims and does not violate any laws the civil case is terminated and half of the fees paid by mr np will be refunded the parties have the right to appeal within three days the court order will be forwarded to the road traffic register and the chamber of notaries for necessary amendments the background of the case is that mr np filed the action on february 2 2023 and the court admitted it on july 12 2023 the claimants submitted a compromise on november 6 2023 which the court approved the court explains that the claimant can bring a new action based on the compromise if the proceedings are terminated the court also orders the reimbursement of half of the fees paid by mr np the personal information of the parties will be replaced with initials in the final court order additionally the owner of a vehicle must provide data to the traffic register and a notary will make entries in the succession register to record the transfer of the estate
